description: go/build: document the behavior of multiple build constraints.

messages.text:
Hello rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com, pkleiweg@xs4all.nl),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go
It must be a feature, because it is used in the standard library, in os/user/lookup_unix.go

On 17 October 2012 10:43,  <nigeltao@golang.org> wrote:
> go/build: document the behavior of multiple build constraints.
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/6725052/

Russ, if this is a bug, not a feature, then I'm happy to fix the bug instead.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=15230435b1de ***

go/build: document the behavior of multiple build constraints.

R=rsc, pkleiweg
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6725052
